title: FT: PSA 4.5 Jennings One Hand Piedmont 350-460 Fac. 42
author: Scott L.

posts.post_title: FT: PSA 4.5 Jennings One Hand Piedmont 350-460 Fac. 42
posts.post_content:
Interested in seeing if I can couple the Jennings with either of my Cobb's to upgrade my current copy. The Jennings is a pop 3, highest graded since they started back designations. Jennings + cash or Jennings/Cobb/cash are also options. Cobb's definitively not for sale. Thanks.

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48785142787_0a79a1ca74_z_d.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48785142637_2086f05000_z_d.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48789153867_e85d64edfd_o_d.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/40899158723_a6e39b46f8_z_d.jpg[/IMG]

Bump. Would consider a trade + cash if need be for cards listed above along with Young glove showing or Johnson portrait. 

Thanks.

Scott
